message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with a channel allocation problem in wireless networks, which is a common topic in the field of information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The use of Whittle index approach suggests a focus on control and optimization (cs.SY), while the development of an index-based heuristic policy involves machine learning and decision making (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
